_PAGE_FILTER_PROPERTY_BY_VALUE_ARGUMENTS:
# Arguments:  
value (Any): The value to be mapped to a property in the mapping object
[mapping={}] (Object): An object defining the mapping of values to properties
[defaultValue=""] (String): The default value returned if the passed value is not found in the mapping object
_PAGE_FILTER_PROPERTY_BY_VALUE_DESCRIPTI: The function filterPropertyByValue enables mapping of values to predefined properties in a mapping object. It checks if the passed value exists as a key in the mapping object. If so, the associated property is returned, otherwise the default value is used.
